gui

Class GUIListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • javax.swing.event.MouseInputAdapter
        • gui.GUIListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

    public class GUIListener
extends javax.swing.event.MouseInputAdapter
    Class GUIListener contains all mouse and key listeners for GUI-object. Keys: CTRL, SHIFT, SPACE and several other keys and combinations. Timers: Space pressed down. highlighting. Mouse Listeners: clicked, dragged, entered, exited, pressed, released, wheel moved.
    Author:
    Antti Kurronen

      • mouseClicked

        public void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        When mouse clicked over ImagePanel and ctrl is pressed down the zooming is launched. Left-button -> zoom in; right-button -> zoom out. If mouse was pressed on glasspane (Precounting running) -> the event is forwarded to method forwardGlassPaneEvent.
        Specified by:
        mouseClicked in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mouseClicked in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter

      • mouseDragged

        Specified by:

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Mediates the MousePressed Event to wanted procedure. Events of PrecountGlassPane are forwarded to forwardGlassPaneEvent(..). Computation of events of ImagePanel depends on which keys are pressed down or which threads are running at same time: CTRL-down -> do nothing SPACE-down -> dragging -> set init dragging point. SHIFT-down -> select/unselect grid cell. MOUSE-LEFT-button -> add marking MOUSE-RIGHT-button -> remove marking and it's highlight point.
        Specified by:
        mousePressed in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mousePressed in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
        See Also:
        MouseAdapter.mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent)

      • mouseReleased

        public void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Mediates the MouseReleased Event to wanted procedure. Events of PrecountGlassPane are forwarded to forwardGlassPaneEvent(..). In ImagePanel made releasing sets previous dragging point as null. -> No More dragging.
        Specified by:
        mouseReleased in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mouseReleased in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
        See Also:
        MouseAdapter.mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent)

      • mouseWheelMoved

        public void mouseWheelMoved(java.awt.event.MouseWheelEvent e)
        Mediates the mouseWheelMoved Event to wanted procedure. Events of PrecountGlassPane are forwarded to forwardGlassPaneEvent(..). Single wheel movement zooms 25% in or out depending wheel movement direction.
        Specified by:
        mouseWheelMoved in interface java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener
        Overrides:
        mouseWheelMoved in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
        See Also:
        MouseAdapter.mouseWheelMoved(java.awt.event.MouseWheelEvent)

      • setComponents

        public void setComponents(GUI gui,
                          TaskManager tm,
                          java.awt.Container contentPane,
                          PrecountGlassPane glassPane,
                          ImagePanel imagePanel,
                          javax.swing.AbstractButton precountButton,
                          javax.swing.JLayeredPane layers,
                          javax.swing.JPanel downBarPanel,
                          javax.swing.JSlider zoomSlider,
                          javax.swing.JPanel sliderPanel)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the components. Components are used to check in which part of gui the mouse was pressed.
        Parameters:
        gui - the gui
        tm - the TaskManager
        contentPane - the content pane at gui
        glassPane - the glass pane of gui
        imagePanel - the visible image panel at gui
        precountButton - the precount button at gui
        layers - JLayeredPane containing Layers at gui
        downBarPanel - the down bar panel at gui
        zoomSlider - the zoom slider at gui
        sliderPanel - the slider panel at gui
